trans-unit.source: Provides methods for persisting Web server controls at design-time.
trans-unit.target: 提供在设计时用于保持 Web 服务器控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister> class provides methods that can persist a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> control or an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface implementation as a string of aspx code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister>类提供的方法可以保持<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>控件或<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>为字符串的 aspx 代码接口实现。

trans-unit.source: The implementation of these methods is driven by metadata attributes, such as the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>, <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法的实现由驱动的元数据属性，如<xref:System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute>， <xref:System.Web.UI.PersistenceModeAttribute>，和<xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerSerializationVisibilityAttribute>。

trans-unit.source: The Web Forms page designer does not support the ResetPropertyName method that is optionally exposed by Microsoft Windows Forms-based controls for property persistence.
trans-unit.target: Web 窗体页设计器不支持 Reset PropertyName （可选） 公开的属性持久性基于 Microsoft Windows 窗体的控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object or an <xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate> interface by parsing a string of control- or template-persistence data, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser> class methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>对象或<xref:System.Web.UI.ITemplate>接口通过分析一串控件或模板持久性数据，请使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlParser>类方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数据字符串，它表示指定控件的持久形式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保持的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数据字符串，它表示指定控件的持久形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示控件的持久形式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>实现正常工作。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> of the specified control to retrieve the designer host.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>要检索的设计器宿主的指定控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to output the persisted control data to.
trans-unit.target: 要将保持的控件数据输出到其中的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保持的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 将代表指定控件的持久形式的数据字符串输出到指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>实现正常工作。

trans-unit.source: This method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A> of the specified control to retrieve the designer host.
trans-unit.target: 此方法使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Site%2A>要检索的设计器宿主的指定控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保持的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" />，它是控件的设计器宿主。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的设计器宿主，获取代表指定控件的持久形式的数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示控件的持久形式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>实现正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to output the persisted control data to.
trans-unit.target: 要将保持的控件数据输出到其中的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" /> to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保持的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" />，它是控件的设计器宿主。

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified control to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的设计器宿主，将代表指定控件的持久形式的数据字符串输出到指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>实现正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 获取可以保持指定控件的内部属性的数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: The component to persist the inner properties of.
trans-unit.target: 要保持其内部属性的组件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" />，它是控件的设计器宿主。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 获取可以保持指定控件的内部属性的数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the information to persist about the inner properties of the control.
trans-unit.target: 字符串，它包含要保持的有关控件的内部属性的信息。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>实现正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The component to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保持的组件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" />，它是控件的设计器宿主。

trans-unit.source: Outputs a string of data that can persist the inner properties of the specified control to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />, using the specified designer host.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的设计器宿主将可以保持指定控件的内部属性的数据字符串输出到指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: This method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> implementation to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要求<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>实现正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of a specified template.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数据字符串，它表示指定模板的持久形式。

trans-unit.source: The template to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保持的模板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" />，它是控件的设计器宿主。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified template.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个数据字符串，它表示指定模板的持久形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the persisted form of the template.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示模板持久形式的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister.PersistTemplate%2A> method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface implementation in order to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister.PersistTemplate%2A>方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>接口实现才能正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to write the persisted template data to.
trans-unit.target: 要将保持的模板数据写入其中的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: The template to persist.
trans-unit.target: 要保持的模板。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" /> that is the designer host for the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost" />，它是控件的设计器宿主。

trans-unit.source: Writes a string of data that represents the persisted form of the specified template to the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将表示指定模板的持久形式的数据字符串写入指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister.PersistTemplate%2A> method requires an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface implementation in order to work correctly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlPersister.PersistTemplate%2A>方法需要<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost>接口实现才能正常工作。
